clinicalPharmacology: Pipobroman is an antineoplastic agent. Specifically it is a piperazine derivative with a chemical structure close to that of many DNA alkylating agents. Pipobroman has well documented clinical activity against polycythemia vera and essential thrombocythemia.
description: An antineoplastic agent that acts by alkylation. [PubChem]
mechanismOfAction: The mechanism of action is uncertain but pipobroman is thought to alkylate DNA leading to disruption of DNA synthesis and eventual cell death.
name: Pipobroman
